1.title: House of Arrivals
1.plot: Fabian's devastated that Nina isn't coming back to Anubis. Eddie's shocked when he recognises new girl, KT, from a vision. He knows she's here on a secret quest. A new teacher moves into the gatehouse.

2.title: House of Presents
2.plot: Victor's furious when a parcel he's expecting goes missing. He doesn't realise it's ended up in Amber's pile of birthday presents. Eddie demands that KT come clean about why she's really here.

3.title: House of Truth
3.plot: Eddie and KT team up to find out what her mysterious key is for. Alfie tells Amber who her bracelet really belongs to. But then they find a coded message in the packaging. What could it mean?

4.title: House of Hieroglyphs
4.plot: Victor's under pressure to find his missing bracelet. Eddie and KT discover that Miss Denby has a key just like KT's... is there more to their new teacher than they first thought?

5.title: House of Revelations
5.plot: Amber is accepted to fashion school - will Alfie lose her to America? Fabian decodes some of the cryptic message from the bracelet packaging. Eddie and KT sneak into Miss Denby's house and make a shocking discovery.

6.title: House of Questions
6.plot: Eddie and KT investigate Miss Denby. Patricia and Fabian suspect KT of working for Victor. Jerome and Mara take the business studies competition seriously and personally.

7.title: House of Pi
7.plot: Eddie makes a shocking discovery about his dad. Fabian translates the message from the envelope. The clues point towards the Gatehouse, but their decision to investigate places Amber in great danger.

8.title: House of Mistrust
8.plot: As Fabian, Patricia and Alfie search for Amber, KT and Eddie's suspicions about Miss Denby are confirmed. Jerome's sabotage of Mara's business project backfires and Amber learns the adults are planning a mysterious ceremony...

9.title: House of Trickery
9.plot: Amber is discovered in the Tank Room and the Sibunas think she's betrayed them all. Eddie and KT are shocked to find a photo of the 'real' Miss Denby but Eddie recognizes her- she's the woman from his vision!

10.title: House of Unity
10.plot: Amber leaves, revealing what she heard in the Tank room and demanding that Sibuna is reformed - they have to stop the adults! Meanwhile Victor is delighted he finally has his bracelet - little knowing it's a fake!

11.title: House of Entrapment
11.plot: The Sibunas discover the man in the tank is Robert Frobisher Smythe - what exactly are the adults plotting? Eddie resolves to reveal Denby's true identity. Meanwhile, Jerome tries to win Mara back.

12.title: House of Sisters
12.plot: The Sibunas find the real Miss Denby, who has some revelations for them... but will they get away without being caught? Jerome sets his sights on Willow. Joy boosts her confidence with a brand new look.

13.title: House of Tombs
13.plot: The Sibunas uncover the details of the secret ceremony in a very special place. They rush to rescue Harriet Denby, but discover she's gone. Jerome's love life is in a tangle.

14.title: House of Smuggling
14.plot: The Sibunas learn that they must perform the ceremony themselves. With news of a school open day, it's the perfect opportunity to sneak out the tank....or is it? Meanwhile, Jerome's double life catches up with him.

15.title: House of Anticipation
15.plot: The Sibunas make it to the Crypt with the tank and begin their ceremony - but Denby's discovered Frobisher has gone. Can Sibuna complete the ceremony before the adults find them? Meanwhile, Joy grants Willow a very special wish.

16.title: House of Close Calls
16.plot: The Sibunas fail to wake Frobisher and are trapped in the crypt with the adults on the warpath. Patricia hatched a rescue plan, but will she manage to rescue her friends? Jerome sweats as roommates Mara and Willow get closer...

17.title: House of Hustle
17.plot: Victor confiscates KT's key and when Jerome begs Patricia for a favour she strikes a deal - if he gets their key back from Victor! The Sibunas discover that the adults have special plans for the eclipse... how will they stop them?

18.title: House of Set-Up
18.plot: Mr Sweet steals the ceremonial bracelet from Eddie and a shock revelation about the descended leaves Sibuna stunned. Jerome worries that Mara and Willow working together will threaten his secret.

19.title: House of History
19.plot: The Sibunas learn the history behind the man in the tank and realise they have to stop the ceremony at all costs! Jerome's list of Mara and Willow's pros and cons ends up in Joy's hands - but what will she do with it?

20.title: House of Eclipse
20.plot: As the eclipse approaches, will Eddie, KT and Fabian get to their friends in time to stop the ceremony? Jerome has a near miss when Joy sends Mara and Willow an incriminating email revealing his secret.

21.title: House of Awakening
21.plot: Frobisher finally wakes up and as the Sibunas predicted, he's evil. Joy tells Willow & Mara about Jerome's two timing ways. Victor and Denby force Mr Sweet to take drastic action against the Sibunas.

22.title: House of Sarcophagi
22.plot: Eddie has a bad feeling something terrible is about to happen. The Sibunas plant secret cameras in the gatehouse and hear a strange voice calling for help. Mara and Willow plot revenge on cheating Jerome.

23.title: House of Possession
23.plot: Eddie has a vision about Frobisher and believes that something very bad is about to happen. At the gatehouse, Frobisher gives Caroline a mission: to find five sinning students to sacrifice to an evil underground Egyptian god, so she picks the Sibunas. The Sibunas are unaware of this until Patricia catches Caroline with their school files. The Sibunas then plant cameras in the gatehouse. They hear a strange voice while watching the cameras and go to investigate. Meanwhile, Mara and Willow get back at Jerome by driving him crazy!

24.title: House of Greed
24.plot: The Sibunas find Frobisher apparently dead - were they wrong all along? Jerome is humiliated in front of the class during the "singing competition". Victor visits the Gatehouse and is captured by Frobisher as his first sinner.

25.title: House of Deceptions
25.plot: The adults are on the Sibunas' tail, looking for their second sinner. Patricia plans to tell Eddie how she really feels about him, little knowing that Victor and Denby have trapped him in the crypt.

26.title: House of Rainbows
26.plot: Joy agrees to Mara's ultimate revenge plot - to break Jerome's heart. Meanwhile Mara discovers she is 2nd in line to inherit a Lord's estate. Eddie escapes the crypt and the Sibunas puzzle over how to unlock a mysterious capsule.

27.title: House of Enemies
27.plot: The Sibunas puzzle over a riddle which leads them to a secret room. Mara is disappointed to learn she has inherited a dog. Denby drives a wedge between Eddie and Patricia in her quest for Frobisher's next sinner.

28.title: House of Surprise
28.plot: Victor discovers the secret room and installs one of Frobisher's fatal booby traps. Miss Denby continues to meddle in Eddie and Patricia's fragile relationship. Joy's persistence finally pays off when Jerome asks her on a date.

29.title: House of Winning
29.plot: Anubis House battle Isis House in a Dodgeball Tournament. Harriet Denby escapes from the gatehouse and KT discovers that there's an easier way into the secret room.

30.title: House of Moonlighting
30.plot: Joy and Jerome share a romantic moment during a very strange date. The Sibunas discover a phonograph in the secret room and it's the final straw for Patricia when she finds intimate messages on Eddie's laptop.

31.title: House of Treachery
31.plot: Eddie realizes there's a traitor amongst the Sibunas when the phonograph is destroyed, but who is it? Frobisher demands a new sinner for Ammut's collection and Mara has a new plan to shame Jerome.

32.title: House of Imposters
32.plot: Denby and Frobisher kidnap Willow but dismay at her inability to sin. Patricia plans to captures KT by offering to help clear her name. Jerome and Joy share a kiss - Mara's plan is backfiring?

33.title: House of Cunning
33.plot: KT's hopes of proving her innocence disappear when Harriet is sectioned. The Sibunas search for the artefacts with the help of a family rhyme when the phonograph is mysteriously restored. Eddie faces the real Sibuna traitor.

34.title: House of Suspicion
34.plot: Willow discovers she's related to Joy and saves the day when she inadvertently provides the clue to a missing artefact. KT decides to run away, leaving Victor without his precious sinner. Fabian learns the truth about Patricia.

35.title: House of Capture
35.plot: When Fabian's trusting nature lands him in the hands of Frobisher, Ammut's collection is almost complete. Meanwhile, Eddie realises the Sibuna traitor is not KT and Jerome shocks Joy with a surprise ending to their play.

36.title: House of Heartbreak
36.plot: Mara is furious as a heartbroken Joy admits her feelings for Jerome. Eddie calls on Patricia's sister for help with the missing artefact clue and KT is torn as she realises she doesn't know who to trust.

37.title: House of Hog
37.plot: Alfie convinces KT that he's not a sinner. They rescue Eddie from Team Evil's clutches - only for Alfie himself to be captured. Joy and Mara are forced to work together when they lose Willow's cherished pet hedgehog.

38.title: House of Defeat
38.plot: Eddie and KT find the final artefact and take it to the gatehouse to destroy Ammut - only to realise they have been tricked. An evil Alfie breaks Willow's heart and Joy and Mara bond while coming to her aid.

39.title: House of Ammut
39.plot: As Ammut begins to form, Frobisher demands KT's key - but where is it? Eddie and KT find it on Willow, and realise the purpose of the keys. Jerome explains his feelings to Joy in a letter. But Joy won't read it.

40.title: House of Heroes
40.plot: Harriet sacrifices herself as Eddie and KT finally unlock the portal to destroy Ammut and save them all. KT says an emotional goodbye to Frobisher. Joy and Jerome have Mara's blessing, and Alfie has a special gift for Willow.

41.title: Touchstone of Ra
41.plot: A fable states that whoever builds the pyramid of Ra will be rewarded with gold but get it wrong and they all pay the price. When a mysterious stone arrives, someone's willing to take that risk. The power of the stone causes chaos, but there's one person who can stop it. (Will they sacrifice themselves to save them all?)

1.title: House of Secrets
1.plot: American girl Nina gets off to a bad start on her first day of boarding school. Her new roommate Patricia is upset that Joy, her old room mate has disappeared without any farewells. Finding that Nina has taken her place just makes things worse.

2.title: House of Attitude
2.plot: New girl Nina is a bit thrown by Patricia's hostility. Fabian fancies the new girl and Mick surprises Amber by asking Mara for homework help.

3.title: House of Blackbird
3.plot: New girl Nina meets an addled old woman who tells her "Beware the Black Bird" and gives her an antique locket.

4.title: House of Dares
4.plot: Patricia insists that new girl Nina be initiated into the house of Anubis... her first mission to steal Victor's spare key to the attic stairs. Meanwhile Amber is jealous that Mick is asking Mara for help with his schoolwork.

5.title: House of Lies
5.plot: The kids get a new history/drama teacher and Amber resolves to make Mick jealous by kissing Alfie.

6.title: House of Locks
6.plot: When Patricia locks Nina in the attic during her initiation, Nina finds a secret attic room.

7.title: House of Eyes
7.plot: Nina shows Fabian the secret room in the attic, where they find a painting with strange markings on the back. Alfie arranges to meet Amber in the laundry room. Patricia steals Joy's school file.

8.title: House of Agendas
8.plot: Victor returns the bags that the staff confiscated but Joy's file is gone. Patricia goes to the police to report Joy's disappearance. Meanwhile Mick attacks Alfie on the soccer field because he's jealous about Amber.

9.title: House of Keys
9.plot: Fabian and Nina find a key hidden in a staircase and wonder what it opens. Mick and Amber patch things up after Jerome comes clean about misleading Mick about Alfie and Amber's laundry-room tryst.

10.title: House of Discovery
10.plot: Patricia snoops in Nina's things and gets offended when she reads about herself in Nina's journal. Nina & Fabian sneak out of Mick & Amber's party to continue exploring the attic hoping to discover what the new key will unlock.

11.title: House of Hyper
11.plot: Victor discovers the stolen key to the attic on the floor of his office and demands that whoever returned it come forward. In a show of solidarity, everyone admits that they returned it. Fabian and Nina visit Fabian's antique dealer uncle to identify the mysterious ceramic cylinders that they found in the locked box. Fabian's uncle identifies them as early Edison phonographic cylinders.

12.title: House of Cheats
12.plot: Jerome catches Mara helping Mick by cheating for him on a French test, he blackmails her into doing chores for him. Meanwhile Fabian & Nina try to listen to the Edison cylinders that they found and Patricia, Alfie & Jerome hold a séance.

13.title: House of Rumours
13.plot: Amber catches Nina sneaking into their room after a late-night rendezvous with Fabian and shares her assumption that there's a romance brewing with Mick. Meanwhile Patricia spots a man spying on her from the bushes but no one else sees him. Amber crashes one of Nina & Fabian's late night attic explorations and ends up distracting Victor when he comes close to catching the trio.

14.title: House of Intruders
14.plot: Following her nightmare, Patricia takes a day off from school. Mick reacts badly when he discovers that Mara cheated for him on the French test. Amber goes overboard on her search for clues but discovers something.

15.title: House of Proof
15.plot: Mister Winkler begins to believe that there may be something to Patricia's concerns about Joy when he finds Joy's cell-phone. Amber, Fabian and Nina found the Sibuna club and pledge to keep the secrets of Anubis house, only to finally solve the rotary puzzle and gain a riddle as a clue.

16.title: House of Confrontation
16.plot: Patricia discovers that the man she saw was a private investigator looking into Joy's disappearance. Meanwhile Mr. Winkler confronts Mr. Sweet with unexpected results. Mick gets upset when Amber seems too busy with Fabian & Nina to spend time with him.

17.title: House of Alarms
17.plot: Patrica is baffled by Mr. Winkler's sudden change in attitude. Nina, Fabian & Amber get one step closer to unraveling the mystery but are startled to hear what sounds like a voice from the present on the old Edison recordings.

18.title: House of Flames
18.plot: Patricia goes through Nina's things looking for the locket that she thinks may be the key to her eye of Horus riddle but is interrupted by Amber. Nina, Fabian & Amber's next clue directs them to get behind a place of fire. Victor introduces a new initiate into his inner circle.

19.title: House of Passages
19.plot: Patrica confronts Amber about ratting her out to Nina. The Sibuna crew discover a secret laboratory.

20.title: House of Kidnap
20.plot: After their discovery of a laboratory in the cellar, Amber & Nina find a black cat.

21.title: House of Catnap
21.plot: Fearing that the black cat that they found is dead, the kids ask Victor to show them what's in the cellar.

22.title: House of Cameras
22.plot: Victor installs security cameras in order to better monitor the students. Mara and Mick compete against each other is a sports quiz. The others discover where the treasure that they've been searching for may have come from.

23.title: House of Numbers
23.plot: When Mick's dad comes to school to discuss his son's changes of study, he learns of the security cameras and issues an ultimatum. Nina, Fabian & Amber discover a surprising old photograph of Victor.

24.title: House of Scares
24.plot: Mara helps Mick train but develops feelings for him. Trudy returns to the house. Jerome overhears the others planning to continue their search and plans a surprise.

25.title: House of Fakers
25.plot: Jerome & Alfie hatch a scheme to profit off the younger students desire to be in the school play. Nina goes to see Sarah to find out more about Victor and the elixir.

26.title: House of Identity
26.plot: Jerome and Alfie plot their revenge but things go wrong when Alfie gets trapped in the cellar. Meanwhile Mara is upset over Mick and decides to change her attitude.

27.title: House of Emergency
27.plot: Alfie accidentally gets dosed with the elixir and ends up in the hospital. Victor interviews everyone about their involvement. Nina makes a decision about Sibuna.

28.title: House of Reunion
28.plot: Mara is upset when Mick gets a new trainer. Jerome & Patricia visit Alfie in the hospital but Patrica meets an unexpected patient there.

29.title: House of Memories
29.plot: After Patricia rescues Rufus from the hospital, he disappears. Amber attempts to help Alfie remember what happened in the cellar by hypnotizing him. Nina & Fabian solve the next part of the mystery but have their reward confiscated when Victor catches them.

30.title: House of Drama
30.plot: Just before the play opens, Nina and Fabian learn what the "treasure" that they are searching for might be. While Victor is watching the play might be the perfect time to retrieve the confiscated puzzle piece from his safe but there's more than one unexpected visitor in the audience...

31.title: House of Codes
31.plot: Mick finds out about the pictures and fears he may be expelled. As the play begins, Nina slips out to retrieve the puzzle piece from Victor's safe. Mick and Mara kiss onstage and realize they have feelings for each other. Patricia receives a message from Joy. Nina makes a surprising discovery in Victor's desk but becomes trapped when Victor returns unexpectedly.

32.title: House of Risk
32.plot: Nina sees Victor open the safe. Mr. Sweet calls to tell Victor that Rufus is in the audience and Victor rushes back to the play. Nina recovers two puzzle pieces from the safe. As the play ends, Victor spots Joy in the audience and chases her.

33.title: House of Thieves
33.plot: Patricia meets with Rufus and shows him the note from Joy. Mick meets with Mr. Sweet, but their meeting is interrupted by Mara -- who confesses to taking the pictures and cropping them to look incriminating. Victor discovers the puzzle pieces have been stolen. Patricia signs out of the house for the night so she and Rufus can try to meet with Joy.

34.title: House of Hazard
34.plot: Following the play, Mara and Mick are still not speaking after their spat. Patricia is in the custody of Rufus and Victor confronts the students about items missing from his safe.

35.title: House of Charades
35.plot: With Patricia still missing, Jerome and Alfie try to impress Alfie's parents. Fabian overhears the staff talking of a plan behind Victor's back and Nina and Amber follow a trail that leads to Patricia and trouble.

36.title: House of Rendez Vous
36.plot: Mara stumbles on a prank that Jerome and Alfie are staging on Mick but Mick discovers her and jumps to conclusions. Fabian finds and rescues Nina & Amber while Mrs. Andrews makes plans to meet with Rufus to rescue Patricia.

37.title: House of Rescue
37.plot: Mick leaves for his try out after reconciling with Mara. Now that Patricia has been rescued from Rufus Victor sets up a video conference to show the Sibuna members that Joy is alive and well. However everyone wonders what he's still hiding.

38.title: House of Arrest
38.plot: With Mick gone Mara befriends Jerome and Alfie feels abandoned. While some of the Sibuna crew feel that the mysteries are now resolved, Nina wants to continue and Fabian agrees. However he loses one of the puzzle pieces. That night, Sarah appears to Nina in her sleep and gives her a mysterious message.

39.title: House of Hoax
39.plot: Fabian tells Nina that he lost one of the puzzle pieces but Patricia gets it back from Alfie. Meanwhile Jerome volunteers to manage Mara's election campaign. And the Sibuna crew are shaken when they solve the next part of the puzzle using Sarah's mystery numbers.

40.title: House of Time
40.plot: Fabian figures out that the newest riddle refers to the grandfather clock in the hallway but the secret compartment is empty. Alfie catches him in the search and the Sibuna crew misleads Alfie with a story about aliens.

41.title: House of Aliens
41.plot: When the Sibuna crew try Nina's numbers on the latest puzzle piece mysterious writing appears on the wall. Meanwhile Mick returns and his comments to Amber are misinterpreted.

42.title: House of Masks
42.plot: Mick plans a candle-lit dinner for Mara but jealous Jerome seeks to sabotage it. Meanwhile Fabian and Alfie go back to the cellar to get another sample of the elixir but Alfie has a flashback and panics.

43.title: House of Pursuit
43.plot: Amber decides to campaign for election against Mara out of her jealousy over Mick. Alfie tells the Sibuna crew about what he saw when trapped in the cellar. Victor determines that Sarah is still alive and goes looking for her.

44.title: House of Yesterday
44.plot: When Mick & Mara grow even closer as they bake muffins for Mara's election campaign, Jerome's jealousy peaks and he switches sides becoming Amber's campaign manager. Meanwhile Victor arranges for Sarah to visit Anubis house in hopes of getting her to finally reveal what she knows.

45.title: House of Victory
45.plot: Nina goes to the old folks home to retrieve a box of things that Sarah left for her. Meanwhile the election comes to a climax with Amber's showmanship giving a Mara's policy ideas a run for the votes. Mick exerts a little pressure on a fellow student in his desire to support Mara.

46.title: House of Bribes
46.plot: Mara is upset by Mick's attempt to fix her election and breaks up with him. Meanwhile Nina attends Sarah's funeral and afterwords catches Victor and Rufus arguing but is caught herself.

47.title: House of Venom
47.plot: Nina fills in the Sibuna Crew on what she learned at the funeral and the gang agree that they need to return to the basement to spy on the initiation ceremony.

48.title: House of Stars
48.plot: It's Nina's unlucky day when Victor padlocks the attic door to stop her going up there again. Now she can't get to the puzzle pieces!/The Sibunas plan to go down into the cellar, to collect some of the elixir and try to crack the latest clue.

49.title: House of Harsh
49.plot: It's Nina's unlucky day when Victor padlocks the attic door to stop her going up there again. Now she can't get to the puzzle pieces! She doesn't even know the worst part yet - Jerome has contacted Rufus and is now spying on the Sibuna gang for him.../The Sibunas plan to go down into the cellar, to collect some of the elixir and try to crack the latest clue.

50.title: House of Lights
50.plot: The Sibuna crew decide to induct Alfie unaware that he's been leaking information to Jerome. Nick goes to embarrassing lengths to apologize to Mara. Nina hears another mystical voice and locates the next clue and puzzle piece.

51.title: House of Allegiance
51.plot: Alfie confronts Jerome when he discloses that he's has been working for Rufus Zeno. Fabian confides to Nina that he's beginning to suspect that the coven has misidentified "the Chosen One." During a spat between Alfie & Jerome, Vistor intervenes and stumbles upon sketches of the puzzle-piece relics. Meanwhile Nina and Fabian find the last of the relics.

52.title: House of Pests
52.plot: Victor gets all of the students out of Anubis house by staging a mouse infestation. He decrees a search for food that might have attracted them as a cover for his searching the students belongings. Fabian and Nina scheme to interrupt the search and sneak back to the house but before their plan comes to fruition, Victor discovers the secret attic room.

53.title: House of Betrayal
53.plot: Worried that Victor might find the relics, Fabian & Nina remove them & split them up among the Sibuna crew. Unfortunately Jerome spots Alfie hiding his.

54.title: House of Revelation
54.plot: Jerome gives Rufus Alfie's puzzle piece much to the dismay of Alfie./Nina hatches a plan to bring Rufus to Anubis House and trick him into bringing the missing puzzle piece.

55.title: House of Heavy
55.plot: Jerome gives Rufus Alfie's puzzle piece much to the dismay of Alfie. Meanwhile Fabian works out that the puzzle pieces may actually be the seven pieces of the Cup of Ankh. But how can they put the Cup together when Alfie's piece of it is missing?/Nina hatches a plan to bring Rufus to Anubis House and trick him into bringing the missing puzzle piece.

56.title: House of Hush
56.plot: Season Finale: Joy fails in her attempts to assemble the Cup of Ankh. Could Nina be the Chosen One instead? The Sibunas face their toughest challenge as Rufus makes his final play for immortality at any cost. After all that has happened, can the students and teachers unite against him?

57.title: House of Spies
57.plot: Season Finale: Joy fails in her attempts to assemble the Cup of Ankh. Could Nina be the Chosen One instead? The Sibunas face their toughest challenge as Rufus makes his final play for immortality at any cost. After all that has happened, can the students and teachers unite against him?

58.title: House of Sting
58.plot: Season Finale: Joy fails in her attempts to assemble the Cup of Ankh. Could Nina be the Chosen One instead? The Sibunas face their toughest challenge as Rufus makes his final play for immortality at any cost. After all that has happened, can the students and teachers unite against him?

59.title: House of Never
59.plot: Season Finale: Joy fails in her attempts to assemble the Cup of Ankh. Could Nina be the Chosen One instead? The Sibunas face their toughest challenge as Rufus makes his final play for immortality at any cost. After all that has happened, can the students and teachers unite against him?

60.title: House of Forever
60.plot: Season Finale: Joy fails in her attempts to assemble the Cup of Ankh. Could Nina be the Chosen One instead? The Sibunas face their toughest challenge as Rufus makes his final play for immortality at any cost.

1.title: House of Hello/House of Dolls
1.plot: The holidays are over and the students are back at Anubis House. Jerome, on the other hand, is trying to avoid someone but why? While The Club is in the attic, Amber comes across a doll house that eerily resembles Anubis House. Meanwhile, Nina tries to find a new place to hide the Cup of Anhk before Victor can get to it.

2.title: House of Spirits/House of Blackmail
2.plot: Jerome is blackmailed by a 7th grader. Nina has a dream, inspired by a riddle.Alfie saves the dollhouse, the gang finds out who is blackmailing Jerome, Senkhara tells Nina to find the Mask of Anubis, and Victor is thiks he will find The Book of Isis

3.title: House of Rivals/House of Faces
3.plot: Mara is upset that Mick's family is moving, Alfie tries to impress Amber, and Fabian writes a poem for Nina.There's a replica of the Mask of Anubis in the Exhibition so Nina and Fabian go check it out.

4.title: House of Myths/House of Nightmares
4.plot: Senkhara leaves her mark on Nina, and Fabian's godfather, Jasper, advises her about the mark and the Mask.Nina thinks the Mask is in the house - and then the dollhouse opens to reveal a map. Poppy researches her and Jerome's father.

5.title: House of Combinations/House of Heartbreak
5.plot: Fabian keeps the Jackal mark a secret, while Nina's map leads them to a secret door in the cellar, but she needs the right code to get in.Amber saves Nina and Fabian from Victor, and insists they tell her what's going on.

6.title: House of Tunnels/House of Goodbye
6.plot: Amber joins the Sibunas as they find the antechamber and amulets. Mara's upset about Mick.Trudy's leaving to work in the Exhibition and Mick is leaving for good. Meanwhile, Jerome decides to hire a Private Investigator.

7.title: House of Protection/House of Letters
7.plot: Amber's temporarily blinded by a strange beacon booby trap. Nina and Fabian discover the only thing that can protect them.Nina and Fabian explore the first Task in the tunnels, set by Sarah's father Robert.

8.title: House of Who?/House of Frauds
8.plot: New boy Eddie arrives and makes an enemy in Patricia. Amber surprises Nina by finding something Nina's been looking for. Eddie causes trouble at Jerome's fundraiser day, and things get worse when Mara figures out it's all a scam.

9.title: House of Chance/House of Divides
9.plot: Nina and Fabian puzzle over the mysterious cube that they found in the tunnels. Nina figures out how to make the mysterious cube into a key to unlock the first door in the tunnels, and soon the Sibunas face their next Task.

10.title: House of Crushes/House of Vertigo
10.plot: The Sibunas' next Task is a deadly Egyptian version of hopscotch. If they get the sequences wrong then the ceiling starts to descend.The gang figures out the safe sequence to cross the deadly hopscotch. Then, when Nina hears Senkhara, she follows.

11.title: House of Pressure/House of Deja Vu
11.plot: The day of the Ball. Amber, Nina and Fabian have had the same dream of the Spirit pushing Nina into the Chasm.The night of the Ball. Amber, Nina and Fabian complete the hopscotch challenge but there's a bigger test to come.

12.title: House of Hoods/House of Deceit
12.plot: The Collector creeps into the Library. Jerome and Alfie bet Eddie that he can't get Patricia to dance, and Eddie wins. Nina flees to the tunnels, while Jerome reads the letter his Dad sent to Poppy. Nina is angry with Fabian.

13.title: House of Sibuna/House of Payback
13.plot: Jerome's dad wants him to visit him in prison. Patricia finds out about Eddie's bet, and Joy & Mara sign up for the school website. The Sibunas practice laying the beam, and Victor finds the lock in the cellar and map of the tunnels, which he copies.

14.title: House of Pendulums/House of Impasse
14.plot: Victor & Vera hide in the cellar & see Nina entering the code. Patricia's revenge backfires, and the Sibunas enter the antechamber.Victor is blinded by the beacon flash. Poppy's Father wants a prison visit. The Sibunas cross the chasm.

15.title: House of Help/House of Phobias
15.plot: Victor's sight returns & he finds a passage. Jerome goes to visit his Dad, but Poppy has beaten him! The Sibunas find a crawl tunnel.Fabian saves Alfie from the tunnel. Amber & Alfie break up. Victor spots the amulet & takes all pupils' jewellery.

16.title: House of Isis/House of Curfews
16.plot: Victor explores the tunnels, the Sibunas plot to get the amulets. Jerome's father has a mission. Vera finds the Book of Isis.The Sibunas plot to keep Victor awake. Jerome begins his quest & Fabian tries to tell Nina he wants to get back together.

17.title: House of Dead-Ends/House of Webs
17.plot: Jerome tells Mara about his dad's mission. Now the Sibunas have the amulets back, they set out to defeat the tunnel of terror.Nina opens the nextTask tunnel. Meanwhile Jerome embarks on a wild goose chase and Vera meanwhile finds a spare amulet.

18.title: House of Fronts/House of Keepers
18.plot: Amber gives Fabian advice about Joy. Alfie's goose eats Jerome's dad's gem. Trudy realizes that Vera is not all she seems.Trudy shares her suspicions with Mrs Andrews. Victor and Vera succeed in swapping the spare amulet. Patricia's amulet falls off.

19.title: House of Hacks/House of Stings
19.plot: Mara investigates a 'profile' on the website.The goose passes the gem, but Mara drops it. Patricia wears the fake amulet.As the Sibunas explore the spider's web task, Patricia arrives to warn them. Mr Sweet tells Mara about Vera's job.

20.title: House of Double-Cross/House of Wires
20.plot: Jerome has Patricia's amulet. Nina & Fabian have to get the gem and do a trade for the amulet. Nina sees a riddle. Jerome has the gem, but has a problem. Mara finds the missing chapter of the Book of Isis. The Sibunas find a clue to the Spider task.

21.title: House of Envy/House of Names
21.plot: Victor is translating The Book of Isis, but it's not as easy as he'd hoped. Eddie tries to get Patricia to admit she likes him & Fabian takes Joy to a movie. Nina decides they should go to the Web chamber without Fabian.Eddie and Patricia misbehave in class - but it's Patricia that Mr Sweet punishes. Alfie and Jerome realize that if Jerome wants the shield in which the gem belongs he'll have to win it back. Mara figures out that Vera's r?sum? is all lies and Nina learns Senkhara's name.

22.title: House of Evidence/House of Genius
22.plot: The Sibunas complete the web task. Nina figures out she's responsible for unleashing Senkhara. Victor can solve the latest task.Jerome needs help to win back the Shield. Victor is seen with chemicals. Mara might oust Vera on the school website.

23.title: House of Slander/House of Hasty
23.plot: Alfie is ping pong coach and Vera's upset with the article. Eddie plans a prank on Mr Sweet. Victor completes the task. Senkhara is furious.Mara & Vera have a hearing about Mara's claims. Fabian thinks he's solved the task, Eddie's Mr Sweet backfires.

24.title: House of Sorry/House of Hex
24.plot: Mara is expelled. Jerome fires Alfie. Vera bribes her witness. Mrs Andrews resigns to save Mara. Patricia learns a secret & Nina gets bad news.Jerome's tournament goes badly. Nina's words are twisted by Senkhara. Nina has a vision of what may happen.

25.title: House of Silence/House of Warings
25.plot: Jerome's opponents used crooked balls. Victor explores the next Task. Nina realizes her words have hexed her friends.Victor has his own amulet. Eddie tries to speak to Patricia. Alfie plays on the horns. The klaxon sounds again, the ceiling cracks.

26.title: House of Status/House of Laments
26.plot: The Dollhouse tells the Sibunas the tune for the task. Amber agrees to be in a commercial. Mara tries to make Mick jealous.Alfie's curse accelerates. Patricia stands Eddie up, Nina finds some of the lyrics, Victor and Vera hatch a plan.

27.title: House of Heists/House of Alibis
27.plot: Vera steals the Ox Bell from the exhibition. Jerome's has to babysit Alfie, and Nina makes a discovery in her bedroom.Fabian is unable to give Trudy an alibi. Eddie is shocked when Patricia tells him she never kissed anyone. Alfie turns into a baby.

28.title: House of Oblivion/House of Snoops
28.plot: Fabian can't remember his name. Vera plants the bell in his room, the Sibunas complete the task. Nina and friends walk into a trap.Victor and Vera's plan backfires. Patricia admits she's been keeping a secret.Trudy gets closer to the truth about Vera.

29.title: House of Reflections/House of Stooges
29.plot: A riddle hints that it is the final chamber before the Mask. Eddie decides to kiss Patricia, and Trudy is missing.Victor has the first of the reflectors. Jasper obsesses over the Gem. Mr Sweet asks Eddie & Patricia to dinner.

30.title: House of Zodiacs/House of Reckoning
30.plot: The race is on to find the reflectors. Mr Sweet doesn't believe the gem has been stolen. Piper turns up posing as Patricia.Victor has his own copy of the Zodiac. Amber makes a copy. Fabian can't decipher the symbols. Jerome hacks Jasper's computer.

31.title: House of Trades/House of Magic
31.plot: Patricia feels Piper is cramping her style. Trudy is kidnapped. The Sibunas discover a door, but need Victor's amulet back to open it.Alfie & Piper get closer. Jerome's search leads him to Sarah's dollhouse. Alfie's magic show leaves everyone reeling.

32.title: House of Tricks/House of Whispers
32.plot: Victor's amulet's in one piece. Eddie reveals kissed Piper. Nina & Fabian realize Vera is after the mask.Eddie & Mara do a story on the website. Alfie has tricked Victor & Vera. Jerome and Jasper are plotting. Patricia reveals Eddie's true identity.

33.title: House of Duplicity/House of Hauntings
33.plot: The race is on to find the missing falcon reflectors. Jasper is confronted about his talks with Jerome. Eddie's reveals a video image of Senkhara.Eddie & Mara start a ghost hunt. Sarah's doll is a falcon reflector, just as Jerome steals it for Jasper.

34.title: House of Collections/House of Speculation
34.plot: Jasper's offering is rejected. Jerome must steal the dollhouse, while Eddie & Mara record it all.The Sibunas find their third reflector. Eddie & Mara get a picture of their "ghost." Mara's theory of their ghost, their story could destroy the mission!

35.title: House of Sabotage/House of Nine Lives
35.plot: Alfie fails to corrupt Eddie's pictures. Fabian must persuade Joy not to run the story. Alfie & Amber steal Eddie's camera.Joy agrees to drop the article. Amber and Alfie confront Jerome and finally learn the awful truth... Rufus is back!

36.title: House of Forgeries/House of Hijack
36.plot: The Sibunas confront Jasper & persuade him to meet The Collector & offer him a counterfeit mask while the Sibunas rescue Trudy.The Sibunas are locked in the barn, & Alfie tries to rescue them. Senkhara vows to hamper Victor's progress in his quest.

37.title: House of Freeze/House of Timeout
37.plot: An article about Nina is on the website. Mara knows "Jack Jackal" didn't write it. Victor rushes to return his reflectors.Vera bears the mark of Anubis & the Sibunas have the reflectors, but they run out of time. Fabian makes a horrific discovery.

38.title: House of Reflectors/House of Illusions
38.plot: The Sibunas know Joy wrote the article. Patricia has a solution to fix both her love life & the gang's problems.The Sibunas enter the final chamber. Eddie & Jerome persuade Mr Sweet about a blogging competition. Rufus' Ceremony of the Mask is a fake.

39.title: House of Dreams/House of Pitfalls
39.plot: The Sibunas must play the game of Senet. Joy's still getting a hard time because of Mara. Trudy's having strange dreams.Victor & Vera practice Senet, while the Sibunas consult Jasper. Jerome makes his move on Mara. The floor gives way beneath Nina.

40.title: House of Phantoms/House of Surrender
40.plot: The Sibunas are reeling at Nina's disappearance and must cover for her. Nina wakes to find herself in an underground cell.Fabian goes to tell Mr Sweet everything, but discovers that Nina is alive. Fabian makes a wrong move and things look even worse.

41.title: House of Strategy/House of Memory
41.plot: Joy didn't submit Mara's article. The gang is shaken after Alfie's near miss.Trudy calls a doctor about her memory. Alfie and Amber spy on Trudy and are shocked at what they hear. Fabian hatches a plan.

42.title: House of Pretenders/House of Trouble
42.plot: Does Mara have feelings for Jerome? Vera follows the doctor's instructions, and the Sibunas play along.Jerome's in trouble when he runs into Rufus sneaking around. Victor is horrified at losing Alfie on the Senet board. Senkhara hunts for the Osirian.

43.title: House of Traps/House of Stakes
43.plot: Mara wins blogger of the year, but is too concerned about Jerome. Disaster strikes the gang when Fabian and Joy disagree.Fabian needs to trust Joy. Victor starts to wonder if the kids were right about Vera, and makes a shocking discovery in her room.

44.title: House of Missions/House of Captives
44.plot: Victor confronts Vera & Patricia tells the Sibunas that Rufus has taken Jerome. Fabian, Patricia & Alfie go to rescue him.Eddie gets into trouble. Fabian, Patricia & Alfie find out why Rufus wants the Mask. Nina unlocks the Mask & learns the truth.

45.title: House of the Chosen/House of Freedom
45.plot: Frobisher Smythe's final trick is revealed. It's a race against time to find the true Mask. Mara and Poppy wish Jerome hadn't disappeared. At the house, Eddie begins to act strangely as the touchstone to the quest is revealed.

imdb.plot outline: American scholarship student Nina Martin arrives at her new school - an English boarding school with a dormitory named after the Egyptian god of death, Anubis. Upon her arrival, fellow student Joy suddenly leaves the school. When Joy's friends, Nina's new housemates, confront her about Joy's disappearance, suspicion quickly turns to the draconian groundskeeper of Anubis House, Victor. Nina and the other students embark on a quest to find out exactly what happened to Joy, while uncovering a world of mystery in the process.
imdb.title: House of Anubis

other companies.name: EuroKids & Adults International Casting and Model Agency

plot: When one of their number disappears on the same day that an American girl joins their ranks, a group of English boarding school students embarks on solving a mystery.::Havan IronOak

American scholarship student Nina Martin arrives at her new school - an English boarding school with a dormitory named after the Egyptian god of death, Anubis. Upon her arrival, fellow student Joy suddenly leaves the school. When Joy's friends, Nina's new housemates, confront her about Joy's disappearance, suspicion quickly turns to the draconian groundskeeper of Anubis House, Victor. Nina and the other students embark on a quest to find out exactly what happened to Joy, while uncovering a world of mystery in the process.
